item.title: What Am I Running?
item.description: Between the two servers I have on my network, I run a lot of stuff. Here’s the gist of what it all does.

About Me I’m a tech enthusiast at heart. I’ve been building computers since 2012, and I’m currently going to school for software development, and networking. I’ve always loved working with computers, and finding new ways to do things. My homelab reflects this, and between 3 servers, and some networking equipment, I’m almost always working on something new. My main network also doubles as the testing network at home, so a lot of this stuff involves fixing things I’ve broken.
